AddOrReplaceActions.Title: 액션 추가 또는 대체
AddOrReplaceActions.Content: {type} {source} 을/를 새 액션 또는 기존 액션을 대체하여 추가하시겠습니까?

SWADE.AddPPDesc: 사용 가능한 PP에 PP 코스트 추가

AmbushAssistant.Hint: 전투원을 드래그 앤 드롭 하여 기습 라운드를 설정합니다.

Visibility.Label: 표시 대상
Visibility.Hint: 이 오라를 볼 수 있는 토큰을 선택합니다. 옵저버 이상의 권한이 있는 토큰의 모든 오라를 볼 수 있습니다.

WallConstraints.Label: 벽에 막힘
WallConstraints.Hint: 이 옵션은 오라가 빛을 차단 가능한 벽에 막히는지 통과하는지를 결정합니다.

SWADE.CharacterSummaryTypeErr: {type} 타입 액터에 대해 캐릭터 요약기를 사용할 수 없습니다.

RedrawDialog.Content: 베니 혹은 공짜로 카드를 다시 뽑습니까?

Dialog.Title: 토글 확인
Dialog.Content: 변경 사항을 적용하기 위해 Foundry VTT 및 접속 중인 모든 클라이언트가 리로드됩니다. 확인하십시오.

SoakDialog.NoVehicleSoak: 탈것에 대한 흡수는 아직 지원하지 않습니다.

RerollSoakDialog.Title: Reroll to Soak Wounds for {name}?
RerollSoakDialog.Prompt: {name} is about to take {wounds}. Do you want to reroll the Soak roll?
RerollSoakDialog.PromptCritFail: {name} is about to take {wounds}. A critical fail is preventing rerolls.
RerollSoakDialog.GMBenny: Spend a GM Benny to Reroll

DamageApplicator.AdjustDamagePrompt: Adjust damage for any abilities and effects {name} might have.

Result.SoakedAll: {name} Soaked all Wounds and is not Shaken!

Incapacitation.InjuryRoll: Vigor Roll to resist injury upon incapacitation
Incapacitation.PermanentInjury: {name} suffers a permanent injury and is Bleeding Out!
Incapacitation.TemporaryInjury: {name} suffers an injury that will go away when all Wounds are healed.
Incapacitation.ShortInjury: {name} suffers an injury that will go away in 24 hours, or when all Wounds are healed (whichever is sooner).
Incapacitation.TakeSuccess: Suffer an injury that goes away when all wounds are healed
Incapacitation.Title: Reroll injury severity for {name}?
Incapacitation.Prompt: {name} is about to be injured. Do you want to reroll the Vigor roll?

DamageApplicator.NoInjuryTable: No Injury Table has been selected. See SWADE Settings Configuration
DamageApplicator.NoTargetsSelected: Please select a target to apply the damage to.

SWADE.DuplicateItemsBodyText: While adding the {type} {name} to the Actor {target} the following duplicates (by name and type) have been found. The new items have been renamed to reflect their source.

EnterSkill.Hint: 아무 기술 이름이나 입력하거나 추천 목록에서 선택할 수 있습니다.

SWADE.EmptyAncestralAbilitiesHint: Warning: This feature is being deprecated in favor of Item grants. If you are creating a new {ancestry} or {archetype}, drag & drop Items onto the Properties tab instead. The {ancestry} or {archetype} will add those Items to the Actor when applied.

ItemGrants.EmptyHint: 이 아이템은 현재 다른 아이템을 부여하지 않습니다.

OpenFavoriteCards.Hint: 유저 설정에서 즐겨찾기 카드 패를 설정할 수 있습니다.

Bennies.Name: 베니 사용/받기
Bennies.Hint: 누르면 베니를 사용하고, Alt키와 함께 누르면 베니를 받습니다.

MessageOnUse.Hint: 이 아이템이 사용되었을 때 메시지를 표시합니다.

SWADE.Name: 이름
SWADE.NoActionDeckDiscardPileFound: 액션 덱 버림패를 찾을 수 없습니다. 생성합니다.
SWADE.NoActionDeckFound: 액션 덱을 찾을 수 없습니다. 생성합니다.

SWADE.NoCardsLeft: 덱에 카드가 부족합니다! {need}장의 카드가 필요하지만 {current}장만 남아있습니다.
SWADE.NoMags: 탄창으로 지정된 소모품이 소지품 내에 존재하지 않습니다.
SWADE.NoTokenSelectedForResistRoll: 저항 굴림을 하려면, 토큰을 하나 선택하십시오.
SWADE.NoUpdatedItemFound: 새로고침에 적절한 아이템을 찾을 수 없습니다.

SWADE.NotOwnedError: 이 작업을 위해서는 이 아이템/액터를 소유해야 합니다.

NumberOfDice.Label: 주사위
NumberOfDice.Hint: 이 액션에 얼마나 많은 특기 주사위가 굴러갈지 결정합니다.

SWADE.ReloadNotPossible: 이 액터 타입은 재장전을 하지 않습니다.

ResourcesUsed.Label: 사용되는 자원
ResourcesUsed.Hint: 이 액션에 사용되는 임의 자원의 양

SWID.ChangeWarning2: 아이템의 새비지 월드 ID를 변경하면 이 아이템에 대한 참조가 깨질 수 있습니다! 주의하시고 진행하십시오.

SWADE.SettingConfDesc: 플레이하고자 하는 환경에 맞게 시스템을 조정합니다.

CharSheetDefaultWidth.Name: 캐릭터 시트 기본 너비
CharSheetDefaultWidth.Hint: Width of character sheets when first opened, in pixels. Default: 650.

HighlightTemplate.Name: 템플릿 항상 하이라이트
HighlightTemplate.Hint: When enabled, Measured Templates alway highlight themselves instead of the grid.

ParryBase.Name: 격투 기술 SWID
ParryBase.Hint: The Savage Worlds ID of the skill which will be used to calculate an actors Parry. Read more about the Savage Worlds ID in the docs!

UseAttributeShorts.Name: 어트리뷰트명 단축 사용
UseAttributeShorts.Hint: Activate this option if you want to see abbreviated attribute names on the pc and npc sheets, i.e. Agi instead of Agility, Sma instead of Smarts, etc. You'll need to close and reopen all open sheets for this option to take effect.

WeightUnit.Name: 무게 단위계
WeightUnit.Hint: Sets whether weights are measured in pounds or kilograms. Changing this will NOT change the weights on items, only how the encumbrance is calculated

HideNpcItemChatCards.Name: NPC 아이템 챗 카드 숨기기
HideNpcItemChatCards.Hint: When enabled, NPC Item Chat Cards are automatically sent as a whisper to all Gamemasters instead of being posted for all to see

EnableBennyNotify.Name: 베니 알림
EnableBennyNotify.Hint: Displays chat messages when bennies are taken, given or refreshed.

HideWC.Name: NPC 와일드카드 숨기기
HideWC.Hint: Do not show which NPCs are Wild Cards to players

CreateInitChat.Name: 우선권 메시지 출력
CreateInitChat.Hint: When Action Cards are drawn, Foundry will output the drawn Action Cards to the Chat if enabled.

AutoInit.Name: 자동 우선권
AutoInit.Hint: Automatically draw Action Cards every round

Benny3DBackBump.Name: 뒷면 범프맵
Benny3DBackBump.Hint: Back bump map of the benny

Benny3DFrontBump.Name: 앞면 범프맵
Benny3DFrontBump.Hint: Front bump map of the benny

CoreSkillsList.Name: 코어 기술 목록
CoreSkillsList.Hint: Enter a comma-separated list of skill names to be defined as core skills for all actors

CoreSkillsPack.Name: 코어 기술 컴펜디움
CoreSkillsPack.Hint: Choose from which Compendium the core skills will be drawn

WealthType.Name: 재산 유형
WealthType.Hint: 캐릭터의 재산과 재화를 어떻게 취급할지 결정합니다

JokersWild.Name: 조커의 와일드
JokersWild.Hint: Gives a Benny to every player character when one of them is dealt a Joker

AmmoManagement.Name: 탄약 관리
AmmoManagement.Hint: Automates ammo consumption. See system documentation journal for details.

PCAmmoFromInventory.Name: PC가 인벤토리의 탄약 사용
PCAmmoFromInventory.Hint: When activated a Gear or Consumable Item that is set as ammunition will be used when reloading the weapon

EnableWoundPace.Name: 속도를 부상에 동기화
EnableWoundPace.Hint: 활성화하면 속도가 자동으로 부상에 영향을 받습니다

NoPowerPoints.Name: 이능 점수 사용 안함
NoPowerPoints.Hint: 이 옵션을 활성화하면 모든 이능 점수 관련 상호작용이 숨겨집니다

AlwaysGeneralPP.Name: 일반 이능 점수 항상 표시
AlwaysGeneralPP.Hint: When enabled the General Powers section always shows even if all powers have an associated Arcane Background

ApplyEncumbrance.Name: 하중 패널티 적용
ApplyEncumbrance.Hint: Apply encumbrance penalties. Please keep in mind that this currently does NOT SUPPORT {vigor} tests to resist {fatigue}!

GmBennies.Name: 게임마스터 베니
GmBennies.Hint: 갱신할때마다 GM이 베니를 얼마나 받을지 결정합니다

VehicleSkills.Name: 지시 기술
VehicleSkills.Hint: Enter a comma-separated list of skill names to be defined as Operation skills for all vehicle

BennyImageSheet.Name: 베니
BennyImageSheet.Hint: Select which image to use for Bennies on the Character Sheet

HardChoices.Name: 어려운 선택
HardChoices.Hint: Checking this will enable the Hard Choices setting rule

CardSound.Name: 카드 사운드
CardSound.Hint: Play a short card sound when dealing Initiative

PC.Name: 플레이어 캐릭터 초기 재화
PC.Hint: Set the amount of currency that Player Character Actors recieve upon creation

NPC.Name: NPC 초기 재화
NPC.Hint: Set the amount of currency that NPC Actors recieve upon creation

NPCCurrency.Name: NPC 재화 사용
NPCCurrency.Hint: When enabled, all NPCs have the same currency options as Player Characters

DumbLuck.Name: 악운
DumbLuck.Hint: Checking this will enable the Dumb Luck Setting Rule

WoundCap.Name: 부상 제한
WoundCap.Hint: Checking this will enable the Wound Cap Setting Rule when calculating Wounds.

UnarmoredHero.Name: 비무장 영웅
UnarmoredHero.Hint: Checking this will enable the Unarmored Hero setting rule when rolling to soak

GrittyDamage.Name: 진창 피해
GrittyDamage.Hint: Checking this will enable the Gritty Damage Setting Rule and allow for selecting the Injury Table to roll.

InjuryTable.Name: 중상 표
InjuryTable.Hint: Select the appropriate RollTable to automatically roll for Gritty Damage.

HeroesNeverDie.Name: 영웅은 죽지 않는다
HeroesNeverDie.Hint: Checking this will enable the Heroes Never Die Setting Rule when determining incapacitation

SWADE.ShowBennyAnimationDesc: 베니를 사용할 때 애니메이션을 표시합니다. Dice So Nice! 가 설치되어있을 때만 작동합니다.
SWADE.SubtractPPDesc: 사용 가능한 PP에서 필요한 PP 만큼을 감산합니다.
SWADE.SysMigrationWarning: SWADE 시스템 데이터가 너무 오래된 Foundry 버전에서 가져온 것이기 때문에 안정적으로 최신화 마이그레이션할 수 없습니다. 프로세스를 시도하겠지만 오류가 발생할 수 있습니다.

ERROR.ActorCreatePermission: This Tour requires permission to create actors
ERROR.SettingPermission: This Tour requires modifying world settings
ERROR.JournalCreatePermission: This Tour requires creating a Journal Entry

AMMUNITION.Title: Ammunition
AMMUNITION.Description: This Tour will show you how to use automated ammunition tracking

GameSettings.Title: Game Settings
GameSettings.Content: First, Ammunition Tracking must be enabled in the game's system settings.

SwadeSettings.Title: SWADE Settings
SwadeSettings.Content: Ammunition settings are found in the Savage Worlds setting configurator

AmmoSettings.Title: Ammo Settings
AmmoSettings.Content: These control if ammo is automatically consumed by ranged weapons.

AmmoManagement.Title: Ammunition Management
AmmoManagement.Content: This setting controls whether firing a ranged weapon consumes any ammo at all, either from the weapons' internal shot counter or from inventory.

PCInventory.Title: Ammo from Inventory
PCInventory.Content: The next three settings control if external items are consumed when a weapon reloads, based on the actor type. If these are unchecked but ammunition management is checked, actors of a given type will consume the shots on an item but can freely reload. This allows for arcade-style ammo management where the reload action is important to track but long-term ammo usage is not.

CharacterWeapons.Title: Character Weapons
CharacterWeapons.Content: A character's weapons are listed in the gear tab.

ReloadNone.Title: Reload Procedure — None
ReloadNone.Content: These weapons ignore the shots counter entirely, pulling directly from the linked ammo item. This setting is best for weapons that only use external ammo, such as a quiver of arrows or a drum-fed gattling gun.

AmmoNone.Title: The Ammo Field
AmmoNone.Content: This should be set to a gear (e.g. Arrows) or consumable item (e.g. Barrel of Bullets) in the character's inventory. A gear item's quantity is consumed directly. Consumable items use their charges instead, with each quantity representing a full set of charges. This field must match the name of the item to be consumed exactly.

ReloadSelf.Title: Reload Procedure — Self
ReloadSelf.Content: These weapons use their own quantity to reset their shots counter. This setting is best for thrown weapons or anything else that is self-contained and uses itself up.

AmmoSelf.Title: The Ammo Field
AmmoSelf.Content: This field is ignored when the reload type is set to self

ReloadSingle.Title: Reload Procedure — Single
ReloadSingle.Content: These weapons reload a single shot with each press of the Reload button. This setting is ideal for revolvers or other weapons with bulky pieces of ammunition that are slow to reload.

AmmoSingle.Title: The Ammo Field
AmmoSingle.Content: This field works similarly to Reload — None, but quantity or charges are consumed by reloading instead of by firing the weapon, as firing the weapon consumes from the Shots counter.

ReloadFull.Title: Reload Procedure — Full
ReloadFull.Content: These weapons reload their entire shot counter with each press of the Reload button. This can be used as a simplified version of the Magazine method or for weapons that don't have detachable magazines, such as a gun with liquid reservoirs.

AmmoFull.Title: The Ammo Field
AmmoFull.Content: This field works similarly to Reload — None, but quantity or charges are consumed by reloading instead of by firing the weapon, as firing the weapon consumes from the Shots counter.

ReloadMagazine.Title: Reload Procedure — Magazine
ReloadMagazine.Content: These weapons use fully detachable magazines that can be swapped as needed, tracking the amount of shots left per magazine.

AmmoMagazine.Title: The Ammo Field
AmmoMagazine.Content: The item named here MUST be a consumable with the Magazine subtype to work correctly. Furthermore, the charges of the consumable should match the shots counter of the weapon.

ReloadBattery.Title: Reload Procedure — Battery
ReloadBattery.Content: These weapons operate similar to magazines, but with interchangeable batteries that are depleted proportional to the shots spent.

AmmoBattery.Title: The Ammo Field
AmmoBattery.Content: The item named here MUST be a consumable with the Battery subtype to work correctly. Furthermore, the maximum charges of the consumable should be out of 100.

ReloadPP.Title: Reload Procedure — Power Points
ReloadPP.Content: These weapons don't reload with physical ammunition but by depleting the wielder's power points, as featured in Rifts® for Savage Worlds

AmmoPP.Title: The Ammo Field
AmmoPP.Content: Instead of naming an item, name a valid arcane type on the character, such as general, magic, miracles, or psionics

TWEAKS.Title: Tweaks
TWEAKS.Description: Learn about the unique sheet modifications in the Tweaks menu

AccessTweaks.Title: Accessing Tweaks
AccessTweaks.Content: The Tweaks menu is found in each character sheet's header, and offers additional configuration options

TraitTweaks.Title: Trait Tweaks
TraitTweaks.Content: This tab provides a large array of additional fields that customize a character's traits

Advances.Title: Advance Mode
Advances.Content: Expanded advances (the default) bring enhanced data handling that specify the type of advance and automatically calculate your character's rank. Legacy advances are simply a large text box to write whatever you want with no data handling.

Unshake.Title: Unshake Modifier
Unshake.Content: Adds a bonus to the automated shake roll that's prompted at the start of a shaken character's turn.

Soak.Title: Soak Modifier
Soak.Content: Adds a bonus to the soak roll that's prompted from the Take Damage button on the system's damage roll cards.

Initiative.Title: Initiative Modifiers
Initiative.Content: Modifies the character's initiative handling based on rules found in the core rulebook.

AutoCalc.Title: Automatic Calculations
AutoCalc.Content: Toggles whether the character's stats are derived from their attributes and equipment or manually set.

ADDSTATS.Title: Additional Stats
ADDSTATS.Description: Learn how to configure Additional Stats for your setting

GameSettings.Title: Game Settings
GameSettings.Content: First, Additional Stats must be configured in the Game Settings.

SwadeSettings.Title: SWADE Settings
SwadeSettings.Content: Additional Stats are found in the Savage Worlds setting configurator.

StatSettings.Title: Additional Stats Configuration
StatSettings.Content: All stats must be first created on this page, to be enabled later on actors and items.

StatKey.Title: Stat Key
StatKey.Content: Stat keys determine how the additional stat is referenced in the data (actor.system.additionalStats.stat-key) and must be unique.

StatLabel.Title: Label
StatLabel.Content: The text that will show up on the character sheet.

HasMax.Title: Has Max Value
HasMax.Content: Adds a field to indicate the maximum of an additional stat as well as its current value (Only available for Numbers and Text).

ActorDisplay.Title: Additional Stats on Actors
ActorDisplay.Content: Additional stats that are enabled on an actor display in the Summary tab.

Checkbox.Title: Checkbox Additional Stats
Checkbox.Content: The value of a checkbox is true or false.

Number.Title: Number Additional Stats
Number.Content: Any number is acceptable, including decimals.

Die.Title: Die Additional Stats
Die.Content: The first field accepts any valid Foundry die expression; append an x to make it explode (e.g. 1d6x). The second is a number that is added. Click the label to roll the die.

Text.Title: Text Additional Stats
Text.Content: Simple string field; the width isn't very long, so long pieces of text should go in the description or other fields.

Selection.Title: Selection Additional Stats
Selection.Content: A fixed list of options based on the game settings.

AccessTweaks.Title: Enabling and Disabling Additional Stats
AccessTweaks.Content: Additional Stats can be enabled or disabled from the Additional Stats tab in the Tweaks menu.

AddStatTweaks.Title: Additional Stats Tab
AddStatTweaks.Content: Each Additional Stat defaults to off and must be individually enabled on each actor or item.

AURAS.Title: Auras
AURAS.Description: Introduced in version 3.2, Auras create persistent visuals that follow tokens around.

AccessAuras.Title: Accessing Auras
AccessAuras.Content: Auras can be found in the Tweaks menu

Auramancer.Title: The Auras Tab
Auramancer.Content: Auras have their own tab within the Tweaks menu. Characters can have a maximum of two auras.

Enable.Title: Enabling Auras
Enable.Content: Each aura can be enabled individually; they also fully work with unlinked tokens, allowing you to set auras individually even if they share a common source actor.

Constrained.Title: Wall Constraints
Constrained.Content: This toggle governs whether the aura is limited by walls that block light or if it can pass through them.

Radius.Title: Aura Radius
Radius.Content: The Aura's radius, measured in grid units. The unit hint displayed here matches the current scene's unit of measurement.

Color.Title: Aura Color and Transparency
Color.Content: Auras display similar to circular area templates around the source character; these settings let you control their visual display.

Visibility.Title: Aura Visibility
Visibility.Content: Select which tokens (by Disposition) can see this aura. You can always see all auras of a token of which you have at least Observer permission.

ADVANCES.Title: Advances
ADVANCES.Description: See how SWADE tracks character advances

AccessAdvanceMode.Title: Setting the Advance Mode
AccessAdvanceMode.Content: A character's advance mode can be switched in the Tweaks menu.

AdvanceTab.Title: The Advances Tab
AdvanceTab.Content: Advances are configured in the primary "About" tab.

Create.Title: Creating an Advance
Create.Content: This button creates a new advance for use

Editor.Title: The Advance Editor
Editor.Content: This form provides configuration info for a new advance.

Type.Title: Advance Type Selection
Type.Content: Choose what kind of advance this is. Currently this does not trigger any further validation or selection, but future updates to the system may change this.

Rank.Title: Advance Rank
Rank.Content: The rank that your character will be upon arriving at this advance. This cannot be directly edited, as it is derived from your character's total number of advances.

Number.Title: Advance Number
Number.Content: This controls the order of advances. Changing this will move the advance to an earlier spot in the list.

Planned.Title: Planned Advances
Planned.Content: You can mark advances as planned to prevent them from counting towards your character's rank.

Notes.Title: Advance Notes
Notes.Content: Include any relevant information about your advance here; what traits you increased, what edges you selected, etc.

SaveChanges.Title: Save Changes Button
SaveChanges.Content: Changes are NOT saved automatically back to the character. You must use the save button in the ProseMirror Editor or this "Save Changes" button

HEADQUARTERS.Title: Headquarters
HEADQUARTERS.Description: Learn about the new Journal Entry Page type, Headquarters! Useful for Fantasy Companion strongholds, Horror Companion lodges, and Super Powers Companion bases.

CreateJournal.Title: Create a Journal
CreateJournal.Content: Headquarters must be created within a parent journal.

CreatePage.Title: Create a Headquarters Page
CreatePage.Content: Headquarters are a new journal page type, just like text, image, and pdf.

HQPage.Title: The Headquarters Page
HQPage.Content: Headquarters are like text pages, but provide more structured input. The sections are modeled after the four steps provided in each of the companions.

Advantage.Title: Advantage
Advantage.Content: The specific advantages depend on what genre you're playing; you can drag roll results into this section.

Complication.Title: Complication
Complication.Content: Like advantages, you can drag roll results into this section.

Form.Title: Form
Form.Content: The form section is split into three parts so you have room to describe every aspect of your headquarters.

Upgrades.Title: Upgrades
Upgrades.Content: You can list your upgrades here. This is a fully rendered HTML input, so feel free to use a bulleted list, table, or whatever other organizational system makes sense to you.

Validation.OnlyOneAncestry: 한번에 하나의 혈통만 가질 수 있습니다!
Validation.OnlyOneArchetype: 한번에 하나의 아키타입만 가질 수 있습니다!

SWADE.WarningPackLocked: 잠긴 컴펜디움을 수정할 수 없습니다. 먼저 잠금을 해제해주십시오.
SWADE.WildDiePresetDesc: 와일드 다이스에 사용될 DSN 프리셋을 선택하십시오.
SWADE.WildDieThemeDesc: 와일드 다이스에 DSN 테마를 적용합니다. '커스텀'을 선택해 직접 만들거나 와일드 다이스가 다르게 보이길 원하지 않는 경우 '없음'을 선택할 수 있습니다. 직접 만든 와일드 다이스는 자신에게만 그렇게 보인다는 것에 유의하십시오. 다른 플레이어들에게는 다르게 보입니다.
